text: my name is Tyler Jacox i'm the chief
information security officer for Master

the pharmaceuticals the life sciences
all of the medical device companies they
need a solution like ours to get their

largest technology partner in our recent
Fed ramp journey the AWS security
assurance services provided a baseline
and a road map that's allowing us to
achieve our Feder moderate ATO by the
end of the year they figured out where
we were in that point in time and then
they built a map to show us where we

digest and and follow that path and uh
it it really helped me as a security
leader to see where we were so that we
understood where to allocate and invest
resources to get where we needed to go
in 2023 with our Fed Ramp project we had
the opportunity to consolidate five
security tools into three which showed a
net savings of
$750,000 over three years we were able
to increase our time to value and
complete our project on time without
budget overruns as we've invested in
security it's opened new business
opportunities it's impacted our topline
revenue because we're able to shorten
the sales cycle we're increased
confidence with our customer base i
think it all starts with the people
because we don't have infinite resources
we need to catch problems as soon as
possible aws has been right there with
